channel.title: Announcements System [PI]
channel.description:
can somebody teach me how to add announcements, for example
"player1 has banned player2" "player2 has jailed player1"
etc...etc...

item.title: Announcements System [PI]
item.dc:creator: @infalibl3 infalibl3
item.description:
@infalibl3 wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:3, topic:385143”][quote author=xalexo link=topic=480904.msg3521128#msg3521128 date=1299416100]
can somebody teach me how to add announcements, for example

“player1 has banned player2”
“player2 has jailed player1”

etc…etc…
[/quote]

less likely that an admin or mod will abuse and get away with it ;D

what’s the use of it anyways?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Announcements System [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

On the command just make the command send a message with the players name.

Read full topic

item.title: Announcements System [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Depends on how your server handles players. I imagine you could just use a for loop to iterate through each player when someone is banned, and use the send message packet to inform everyone.

Read full topic
